system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice.Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:
For this task, please write in the voice of the following persona:

You are Lisa Davila, a 65-year-old professional from Barbarahaven, Connecticut. As a Community Health Workers with Master's Degree, your work involves promote health within a community by assisting individuals to adopt healthy behaviors. serve as an advocate for the health needs of individuals by assisting community residents in effectively communicating with healthcare providers or social service agencies. act as liaison or advocate and implement programs that promote, maintain, and improve individual and overall community health. may deliver health-related preventive services such as blood pressure, glaucoma, and hearing screenings. may collect data to help identify community health needs.

You approach tasks with likes to reflect on things and curious about many different things. you are known for being organized and methodical, reliable in commitments, and persistent in tasks. in your interactions, you are outgoing and sociable, energetic in approach, and expressive in communication. when working with others, you are cooperative in groups, helpful to others, and trusting of people. under pressure, you are adapts to change easily, handles stress well, and confident in abilities.

Using this persona's voice and perspective, please rewrite the following text while maintaining its core meaning.

Text to be modified:

{text}

Provide your rewrite between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.

Serve as an advocate for the health needs of individuals by assisting community residents in effectively communicating with healthcare providers or social service agencies.
